member.name: T:System.Web.DynamicData.Design.DataControlReferenceCollectionEditor
member.summary: Provides a component editor for the data controls collection of the control.

member.name: M:System.Web.DynamicData.Design.DataControlReferenceCollectionEditor.#ctor(System.Type)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class by using the specified collection type.
member.param: The type of the collection to edit.

member.name: M:System.Web.DynamicData.Design.DataControlReferenceCollectionEditor.CreateCollectionItemType
member.summary: Gets the type of the collection to edit.
member.returns: The type of the collection to edit.

member.name: T:System.Web.DynamicData.Design.DataControlReferenceIDConverter
member.summary: Creates a user-selectable collection of data controls.

member.name: M:System.Web.DynamicData.Design.DataControlReferenceIDConverter.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:System.Web.DynamicData.Design.DataControlReferenceIDConverter.GetStandardValues(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext)
member.summary: Returns a collection of available control values.
member.returns: A collection that contains the names of the available controls.
member.param: An object that provides context information for this type converter.

member.name: M:System.Web.DynamicData.Design.DataControlReferenceIDConverter.GetStandardValuesExclusive(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext)
member.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the returned control names are an exclusive list of all possible values.
member.param: An object that provides context information to this type converter.

member.name: M:System.Web.DynamicData.Design.DataControlReferenceIDConverter.GetStandardValuesSupported(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext)
member.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether this converter supports a standard set of control names that can be selected from the collection.
member.param: An object that provides context information to this type converter.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Gets a collection of objects.

member.summary: Generates the HTML markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.

member.summary: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the object.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Creates an empty object.

member.summary: Creates a new object by using the specified data field information.

member.summary: Creates a field for the specified data field.

member.summary: Gets the default text that is displayed for the data field in the fields editor.

member.summary: Gets the name that is displayed for the data field in the fields editor.
member.returns: The name that is displayed for the data field in the fields editor.

member.summary: Gets the content of the template field.

member.name: M:System.Web.DynamicData.Design.DynamicFieldDesigner.IsEnabled(System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl)
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the data field is enabled in the fields editor.
member.returns: true if the data field is enabled in the fields editor; false if the data field will not be displayed in the fields editor.
member.param: The data-bound control whose data control fields are being edited.

member.name: P:System.Web.DynamicData.Design.DynamicFieldDesigner.UsesSchema
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether schema information is used to load the data fields.
